ygData.subject: Re: Places to hunt for a lvl 13 or above wizard....
ygData.msgSnippet: Unrest is good if you are in Felwithe area or at least on that continent. Not sure about the other continents as I have asked the same question about my 15th
ygData.messageBody:
Unrest is good if you are in Felwithe area or at least on that continent.
Not sure about the other continents as I have asked the same question about
my 15th level wizard hunting in Karana.

- Ziff

-----Original Message-----
From: Josh Zimmerman [mailto:zimm7817@...]
Sent: Monday, April 19, 1999 9:26 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Places to hunt for a lvl 13 or above wizard....


From: Josh Zimmerman <zimm7817@...>

Any help in this area would be greatly appreciated, also if you could
give a short description on how to go about finding them it would help a
great deal. Nothing in depth, I like to explore, I just want some sort
of direction to head.

Thanks for your time,
Illistar, lvl13 Eurdite Wizard, Veeshan Server
